title: Dan Levy
itunes:title: Dan Levy
description:
Whitney's best friend of eighteen years comedian-writer-producer Dan Levy is the guest and you don't want to miss it.  Dan created and was the executive producer of the NBC comedy Indebted starring Fran Drescher based on his life.  He is currently the co-executive producer of How I Met Your Father for HULU and host of House Hunters: Comedians on Couches streaming on HGTV / Discovery Plus. When he’s not scrolling Zillow he’s collecting sneakers and kids.  Oh and his dad is not Eugene Levy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
